subject: Golf
British Open (Golf)
organizations: Royal Lytham & St Annes Golf Club
lead_paragraph: Brandt Snedeker tied the 36-hole British Open record with a 10-under 130, and leads Adam Scott by one shot.
snippet: Brandt Snedeker tied the 36-hole British Open record with a 10-under 130, and leads Adam Scott by one shot.
